alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:57PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye and south central Eureka Counties through 330 PM PDT... At 256 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles west of Eureka, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
